body.p:
321
May 13th 4
Maj Geo. T. Barnes.
12: Ky Cavy. Vols,
Sir,

I understand from Capt. Crutchfield that he is commanding Company E of your Battalion, as there is a Company E. already in the 12: Cavalry, this Company will have to be assigned to another Regiment. of Cavalry.
I am instructed by the Governor to inform you that -- Capt. Crutchfields Company must make their choice and that they form no part of your command but are considered as unassigned recruits.

Respy
Your obedt Sevt
John Boyle
Adjt Genl of Ky
